name: Snake Deminer
description:
Snake Deminer is a fun little puzzle game based around logic and reasoning, where a grid of paths and mines is randomly generated. Your goal is to uncover the paths while avoiding the mines to help the snakes reach their destinations!

Use the clues and your logical thinking to figure out which cells contain what, helping the snakes to get home across an infinity of procedurally generated levels.

Mobile version coming soon(ish)!
